name: Wolverine
aliases: Laura X, Talon, Captain Universe, X-23, Wolverine
powersText:
Expert assassin, martial artist, sniper and demolitioner
Trained in use of long range weapons and explosives
Educated multi-lingual
Superhuman strength, senses, speed, agility, reflexes/reactions, coordination, balance and endurance
Regenerative healing factor
Retractable adamantium-coated bone claws in hands and feet
